module.name: mls

desc.p: This module contains interfaces for handling multilevel security. The interfaces allow the specified subjects and objects to be allowed certain privileges in the MLS rules.

module.required: Contains attributes used in MLS policy.

interface.name: mls_file_read_up
interface.summary: Make specified domain MLS trusted for reading from files at higher levels.

interface.name: mls_file_write_down
interface.summary: Make specified domain MLS trusted for writing to files at lower levels.

interface.name: mls_file_upgrade
interface.summary: Make specified domain MLS trusted for raising the level of files.

interface.name: mls_file_downgrade
interface.summary: Make specified domain MLS trusted for lowering the level of files.

interface.name: mls_file_write_within_range
interface.summary: Make specified domain trusted to be written to within its MLS range. The subject's MLS range must be a proper subset of the object's MLS range.

interface.name: mls_socket_read_all_levels
interface.summary: Make specified domain MLS trusted for reading from sockets at any level.

interface.name: mls_socket_read_to_clearance
interface.summary: Make specified domain MLS trusted for reading from sockets at any level that is dominated by the process clearance.

interface.name: mls_socket_write_all_levels
interface.summary: Make specified domain MLS trusted for writing to sockets at any level.

interface.name: mls_net_receive_all_levels
interface.summary: Make specified domain MLS trusted for receiving network data from network interfaces or hosts at any level.

interface.name: mls_sysvipc_read_all_levels
interface.summary: Make specified domain MLS trusted for reading from System V IPC objects at any level.

interface.name: mls_sysvipc_write_all_levels
interface.summary: Make specified domain MLS trusted for writing to System V IPC objects at any level.

interface.name: mls_rangetrans_source
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to do a MLS range transition that changes the current level.

interface.name: mls_rangetrans_target
interface.summary: Make specified domain a target domain for MLS range transitions that change the current level.

interface.name: mls_process_read_up
interface.summary: Make specified domain MLS trusted for reading from processes at higher levels.

interface.name: mls_process_write_down
interface.summary: Make specified domain MLS trusted for writing to processes at lower levels.

interface.name: mls_process_set_level
interface.summary: Make specified domain MLS trusted for setting the level of processes it executes.

interface.name: mls_xwin_read_all_levels
interface.summary: Make specified domain MLS trusted for reading from X objects at any level.

interface.name: mls_xwin_write_all_levels
interface.summary: Make specified domain MLS trusted for writing to X objects at any level.

interface.name: mls_colormap_read_all_levels
interface.summary: Make specified domain MLS trusted for reading from X colormaps at any level.

interface.name: mls_colormap_write_all_levels
interface.summary: Make specified domain MLS trusted for writing to X colormaps at any level.

interface.name: mls_trusted_object
interface.summary: Make specified object MLS trusted.

desc.p: Make specified object MLS trusted. This allows all levels to read and write the object.
This currently only applies to filesystem objects, for example, files and directories.

interface.name: mls_fd_use_all_levels
interface.summary: Make the specified domain trusted to inherit and use file descriptors from all levels.

interface.name: mls_fd_share_all_levels
interface.summary: Make the file descriptors from the specifed domain inheritable by all levels.

interface.name: mls_context_translate_all_levels
interface.summary: Make specified domain MLS trusted for translating contexts at all levels.
